About Robert Skelton

I am a Sr Infrastructure Architect at GE Transportation based in Palm Bay, FL. I earned a BS in Computer Engineering from Auburn University in May 2015, and I’ll complete a MS in Computer Science from Georgia Tech in 2019.

My favorite topics are finance, technology, craft beer, college football, cars, and home renovations. I also run Beer Tasting Brevard.
